<!-- Title: base-layout.component
Author: Megan Walker
Date: 08-16-2023
Description: Base layout component for the Nodebucket application.
Source: Professor Krasso, Angular.io -->

<app-nav></app-nav> <!-- website navbar -->

<main class="mt-5 pt-5">
  <!-- The router outlet is where the different child components of the BaseLayout are rendered.  -->
  <router-outlet></router-outlet>
</main>

<app-footer></app-footer> <!-- website footer -->
